body_html: You can still use all layers and slim.arg_scope with tf.contrib.layers but not with tf.layers. Slim layers, losses, and metrics have been merged into tf.contrib.layers, tf.contrib.losses, tf.contrib.metrics.
body_text: You can still use all layers and slim.arg_scope with tf.contrib.layers but not with tf.layers. Slim layers, losses, and metrics have been merged into tf.contrib.layers, tf.contrib.losses, tf.contrib.metrics.
body: You can still use all layers and slim.arg_scope with tf.contrib.layers but not with tf.layers. Slim layers, losses, and metrics have been merged into tf.contrib.layers, tf.contrib.losses, tf.contrib.metrics.
